Reviews.Title: Best Buy
Reviews.Author: maria mojica
Reviews.Content: unbeatable price for a great smartphone.(Competes with top notch phones and for about $150 less.I will buy another one soon).

Reviews.Title: Blue Dot Epic Fail
Reviews.Author: Scott H.
Reviews.Content: Worked for 2 months LCD died not with the price if you look at the other options out there.  Beware who you buy from !

Reviews.Title: everything is false
Reviews.Author: Elvis Diaz
Reviews.Content: this company is a scammer, cell motorola atrix 2 is used to buy them and also came locked. He says that in his publication that is unlocked and new.everything is false

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS PHONE ...Omg!
Reviews.Author: Chalie Ann Davis
Reviews.Content: This phone is amazing! The display is beautiful. I love the camera. Its fast just like my Motorola Atrix 4G....and it runs smothe.The screen on my Artix 4G (MB860) got cracked so even though I am going to order a new glass replacement I wanted to upgrade as well. I always use GSM Arena to compare my phones to make sure that I dont buy a phone that is less in features and ability. Boy did I hit the nail on the head with this one.I live in the Bahamas and while our people are mainly impressed with the HTC's, Samsung Galaxy's, Iphones and any other big names and latest phones that you can think of I like phones like these that they dont normally go after. My brother says I always buying these weird phones lol but little that he knows my phone is just as good as his Samsung Galaxy S4 in my world lol. The display is even as good as his own.I really appreciate the seller I got this from. I purchased it used and unclocked and it came unlocked but doesn't looked used at all! Super deal for $87. Best deal I found on Amazon since the year started lol.

Reviews.Title: Motorola Atrix 2 " Came LOCKED!!!"
Reviews.Author: Edmilson
Reviews.Content: I have bought a Motorola at this Store, they said it wasUNLOCKED, but the Cell Phone Motorola Atrix 2came LOCKED!!!I am very disappoint!!!!You trust a announce, buy the product, and the productcomes not the way they say!!! I am very UNHAPPY!!!

Reviews.Title: Great entry smartphone for ATT
Reviews.Author: D. Vitali
Reviews.Content: It does Google skymap. Battery life could be better , may buy extended battery, needs to be charged every other day or so.

Reviews.Title: satisfied
Reviews.Author: Happy camper
Reviews.Content: The screen is very sensitive. Don't know why. We had a phone just like this prior to this one and it didn't do this but it will start texting things you don't type and the apps will move all  over the screen.

ProductInfo.Features:
Modes: WCDMA 850 / 1900 / 2100 and GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
Operating system: Android 2.3.5 (Gingerbread)
8MP Camera with auto-focus, LED flash / panorama, night modes and 1080p HD Video Capture.
DLNA (Digital Living Network Alliance) Stream, store and share content with compatible devices around the home like HDTVs, game consoles and PCs.
Battery life: Talk= 8.5 hours (510 minutes)//Standby: 382 hours (15.9 days) 1785 mAh LiIon, Removable
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola Atrix 2 4G MB865 Black AT&T [Non-retail Packaging] Unlocked
